title: Revealed: The 2024 Unbound Gravel Course Is Chunkier and More Technical Than Ever
content:
2024 will see the 200-mile race going north for the third time in history, as well as significant changes to address finish line safety and the elite women's race experience.

Read the full article at Revealed: The 2024 Unbound Gravel Course Is Chunkier and More Technical Than Ever on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
